thread.title: David Beckham dedicates `Buster tattoo to son
thread.title_full: David Beckham dedicates `Buster tattoo to son

title: David Beckham dedicates `Buster tattoo to son
text:
David Beckham dedicates `Buster? tattoo to son 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Monday 31st August, 2015 
Former footballer David Beckham has added one more tattoo on his body and has dedicated it to his eldest son Brooklyn. 
The new tattoo has been inked on Bekham's neck and it reads 'Buster', reports aceshowbiz.com. 
'Buster' was the moniker that the former footballer gave to his eldest son. 
Unveiling the tattoo tribute on his account on photo-sharing website Instagram on Sunday, the father of four wrote: "I've always called Brooklyn (Buster) since the day he was born.... Love you Bust @brooklynbeckham." 
Prior to the word 'Buster', he had the famous '99' inking, which he dedicated to wife Victoria to mark the year they got married and welcomed their son Brooklyn. 
Last month, he unveiled on Instagram a new piece of body art featured the words 'Pretty Lady', which was dedicated to his daughter Harper. 
The tattoo was written above his current 'Harper' ink near his neck. More Technology Industry News
